bloodbath.title: The Bloodbath
bloodbath.description: As the witches stand on their podiums, the horn sounds.

arena.description: Hmis are let loose in the arena.

arena.description: A mysterious darkness lingers around this place.

{0} drinks a worm blood potion.
{0} cowers until the day is over.

{0} steps into toxic sludge.
{0} wanders into a sinkhole and disappears.
{0} misses a pit and falls to their death.
{0} is ambushed by {1} in the dark and killed.
{0} misfires a wand and kills themselves.
{0} wanders into a group of Hmis.
{0} attacks {1} thinking it's a Hurta and kills them.
{0} falls into an acid pool.
{0} is crushed by a falling stalactite.
{0} drowns in a flooded cavern.
{0} is devoured by a pack of rotta.

arena.title: Arena Event: Flooded
arena.description: Where did all this water come from?

nonfatal.msg: {0} swims to higher ground.
{0} and {1} work together to build a makeshift raft.
{0} treads water until the flood subsides.
{0} uses a wooden plank as a flotation device.
{0} grabs onto floating debris to stay afloat.
{0} pulls {1} out of a whirlpool.
{0} rides a current to safety.
{0} breaks a hole in a wall to drain water.
{0} uses a bomb to redirect water flow.
{0} swims under a submerged tunnel.
{0} uses a fishing rod to hook onto a ledge.

fatal.msg: {0} drowns in the deepest pool.
{0} is pulled under by a sudden surge.
{0} is crushed by falling debris in the water.
{0} electrocutes themselves with a submerged Ukkoskivi
{0} panics and swallows water.
{0} drags {1} down to drown them.
{0} swims into an avalanche of water and dies.
{0} is swept into a lava pool
{0} is impaled by a hidden spike underwater.
{0} fights {1} underwater, and both drown.
{0} accidentally triggers a flood trap and is carried away.
{0} sacrifices themselves to save {1}, but both drown.

nonfatal.msg: {0} spots a tripwire and carefully disarms it.
{0} uses a wand to trigger a trap from a distance.
{0} and {1} move slowly to avoid hidden mines.

{0} triggers a trap and narrowly escapes the blast.
{0} digs around suspicious ground and finds a mine.
{0} uses a luminous drill to probe for hidden explosives.
{0} and {1} use wands to clear tripwires.
{0} notices pressure plates and hops around them.
{0} finds a safe path through the danger zone.

{0} sets off a booby trap with a wand.
{0} accidentally steps on a mine meant for {1}, killing {1}.
{0} pulls {1} into a landmine, then escapes.
{0} is blown to pieces by a proximity mine.
{0} tries to disarm a trap and triggers it on themselves.
{0} and {1} investigate a suspicious crate; both die.
{0} forces {1} to test a trap; {1} dies.
{0} throws a bomb into a landmine and gets caught in the blast.

arena.title: Arena Event: Hot
arena.description: Scorching heat envelops the arena; barren soil ignites on contact and water rapidly evaporates.

nonfatal.msg: {0} uses Freeze Charge to cool down the air
{0} casts Circle of Stillness, momentarily halting the spread of flames around them.
{0} employs Burst of Air to push away encroaching fire, clearing a safe passage.
{0} utilizes Digging Bolt to tunnel beneath the fire, avoiding direct contact.
{0} drinks a Water Potion, in order to cool down
{0} casts Rain Cloud, creating a localized downpour that suppresses nearby flames.
{0} uses Teleport Bolt to escape a rapidly spreading fire.
{0} employs Slime Mist to coat themselves.
{0} casts Circle of Water, creating a barrier against the spreading fire.

fatal.msg: {0} steps onto barren soil, which ignites instantly, engulfing them in flames.
{0} casts Firebolt too close to themselves, resulting in a fatal explosion.
{0} attempts to use Plasma Beam to clear a path but is consumed by the resulting inferno.
{0} drinks an unknown potion, which turns out to be Lava, leading to their demise.
{0} is caught in a chain reaction of exploding Oil Barrels, perishing in the blast.
{0} tries to extinguish themselves with a Oil Potion, inadvertently fueling the flames.
{0} misfires a Bomb spell, causing a cave-in that traps and incinerates them.
{0} uses Teleport Bolt but reappears inside a pool of lava, leading to instant death.
{0} activates Circle of Fire, burning themselves to death..
{0} attempts to cross a bridge weakened by fire, which collapses, dropping them to their death
{0} is overwhelmed by heatstroke in the scorching environment, succumbing to the extreme temperatures.

arena.title: Arena Event: Cozy
arena.description: The arena becomes cozy and furnished. Furniture blocks paths, and Mimics lurk among the chests.

nonfatal.msg: {0} rests briefly on a cozy bed.
{0} hides behind a wardrobe to avoid attention.
{0} climbs onto a dresser to spot nearby movement.
{0} rearranges furniture to block off a hallway.
{0} uses a bunk bed to hide supplies.
{0} discovers a regular chest and takes its contents safely.
{0} vaults over a table to escape a skirmish.
{0} pushes a chair aside, revealing a hidden passage.
{0} accidentally tips over a footlocker but is unharmed.
{0} carefully tests a chest and confirms it's not a Mimic.
{0} knocks over a decorative shelf, making a loud noise but avoiding detection.
{0} wedges a chair under a door handle, delaying pursuit.

fatal.msg: {0} opens a chest, but it's a Mimic and they are killed instantly.
{0} is crushed as a stacked dresser collapses.
{0} is impaled on shattered furniture during a scuffle.
{0} topples a cabinet that pins and kills them.
{0} tries to flee through a pile of chairs and trips, breaking their neck.
{0} gets ambushed while looting what they thought was a normal chest.
{0} triggers a mimic swarm by disturbing a cluster of chests.
{0} bleeds out after falling onto a shattered table leg.
{0} attempts to hide inside a chest, but it's already occupied by a Mimic.
{0} takes a wrong step off a tall bookshelf and breaks their neck.
{0} panics and throws a bomb indoors, collapsing the entire room.
{0} kicks open a chest, but a bomb inside explodes and kills them.

{0} rests on a couch while {1} keeps watch.
{0}, {1}, and {2} share a quiet moment seated around a wooden table.
{0} finds a wardrobe and hides inside, while {1} guards the entrance.
{0} topples a bookshelf by accident, nearly hitting {1}.
{0} carefully tests a chest, and {1} helps confirm it's not a Mimic.
{0} props a chair against a door, and {1} nods approvingly.
{0} climbs onto a tall dresser for a better view of the room.
{0} stumbles into a footlocker and knocks over a lamp.
{0} finds an empty bunk bed and rests for a moment.
{0} and {1} push a heavy cabinet across a hallway to block a path.
{0} and {1} examine two chests and both turn out to be safe.

fatal.msg: {0} and {1} open a chest which turns out to be a mimic. {1} escapes, but {0} is killed.
{0} and {1} fight over a chest. It turns out to be a Mimic and kills them both.
{0} topples a wardrobe that crushes {1}.
{0}, {1}, and {2} collapse a bunk bed while fighting. {2} dies in the wreckage.
{0} pushes {1} off a bookshelf to gain the high ground, killing them.
{0} kicks a chair that trips {1} into a sharp broken cabinet.
{0} investigates a chest. It's a Mimic, and it eats them whole.
{0} is pinned by a falling dresser and can't escape the fire that follows.
{0} gets startled by {1} and falls backward into a pit.
{0}, {1}, and {2} all pull the same chest open. It's a Mimic and kills {1}.
{0} tries to jump over a footlocker but trips and snaps their neck.
{0} dies when a barrel flung by an explosion hits them in the head.

{0} throws a wand into a room, triggering an arc trap harmlessly.
{0} and {1} team up to push a metal barrel through a charged tunnel.

arena.title: Arena Event: Wet Soil
arena.description: It smells like wet soil after rain.
